name: InterviewQuest
description: In this riveting adventure, you, the protagonist have decided to subject yourself to the horrors of the infamous job interview. Why you have chosen to confront the dreaded hiring manager in his treacherous dungeon, deep in the bowels of datacorp’s castle, is your own business. Armed with nothing but your overpriced college degree and your stunning wit, you will brave senseless questions and undecipherable challenges. Once you have completed your interview, you will receive your sentence from the job market’s omnipotent court of faceless corporations. Interview quest is a game that attempts to poke fun at the conventions of the modern job search, and in doing so prompt players to reflect on the idiosyncrasies of the job market.
